en: Although it was raining, we went out.
Despite the rain, the picnic continued.
Although he was tired, he kept working.
She was late; however, she apologized.
example: Use however in a compound sentence.

en: Despite being busy, he helped us.
Although the food was cold, it tasted good.
He tried hard; however, he did not pass.
Despite the noise, she slept well.
Although the road was closed, we found another way.

en: He left early; however, I stayed until the end.

en: Despite the rain, they played the match.
Although I was scared, I kept going.
She is busy; however, she helps others.
Despite being late, they made it to the show.
